gen:link.msg:message: `AssetsCurrent` BEHOORT gelijk te zijn aan de sommatie van de onderliggende waarden. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedBalanceSheetSegmentationSectorsEducation_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenDParentDebit3_AssetsCurrent')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedBalanceSheetSegmentationSectorsEducation_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenDParentDebit3_AssetsCurrent return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedBalanceSheetSegmentationSectorsEducation_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenDParentDebit3_ChildrenOfAssetsCurrentDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedBalanceSheetSegmentationSectorsEducation_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenDParentDebit3_ChildrenOfAssetsCurrentDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedBalanceSheetSegmentationSectorsEducation_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenDParentDebit3_ChildrenOfAssetsCurrentCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedBalanceSheetSegmentationSectorsEducation_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenDParentDebit3_ChildrenOfAssetsCurrentCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}
